attributes.action: A more relevant Mandatory Work Activity
attributes.additional_details: I think the Mandatory Work Activity (MWA) is a fantastic scheme to help the unemployed (back) into work. I want the type or organisation who hosts your MWA to be in your former or future industry, rather than a completely unsuitable industry. Charity shops, while valuable, are not suitable for all claiments. I want the Government to recognise claiments' career paths.
